sentences.sContent: the ideologies of fascism and terrorism
sentences.sCn: 法西斯主义和恐怖主义的意识形态

sentences.sContent: a new ideology based on individualism
sentences.sCn: 基于个人主义的新思想体系

remMethod.val: ideo(思想) + logy → 思想体系

trans.tranCn: 意识形态；思想意识；观念学
trans.tranOther: a set of beliefs on which a political or economic system is based, or which strongly influence the way people behave
